feed.title: Home Monitoring and Automation
feed.description:
Work-in-progress! ==Problems with the server== Fixing these days!!

This is part of a research project for the PRISPA house, the Romanian team participating in the Solar Decathlon Europe 2012, the most important competition nowadays promoting the use of solar energy (for more info check: http://prispa.org/ and  http://www.solardecathlon.gov/sd_europe.html). 

You can also find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/prispa2012

This project is evolving. Sensors and actuators will be added in the near future.

Now monitoring: 

- temperature in apartment hallway  
- humidity in apartment hallway 
- temperature inside the refrigerator 
- humidity inside the refrigerator 

Next on the list:

Indoors:
- open/close refrigerator (to combine the info with temp and humidity inside and outside  the refrigerator to see how they influence one another. Refrigerator temperature will be monitored in the competition)
Outdoors:
- radiation levels using a Sparkfun Geiger counter.
- light intensity (will work with a curtain actuator)
- tempererature and humidity

For now the whole infrastructure is based on Arduino + Mac Mini Server + Max/MSP + Pachube.
feed.creator: https://xively.com/users/zws
feed.TitleHTML: Home Monitoring and Automation
